meanings.definition: The state or quality of being composed.
meanings.sent1: Her calm and collected composednesses helped her handle the stressful situation.
meanings.sent2: The composednesses of the painting reflected the artist's attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The composednesses of the sleeping cat made it look like a peaceful statue.
meanings.sent4: The composednesses of the orchestra conductor brought harmony to the chaotic music.
meanings.sent5: The composednesses of the old oak tree in the storm was a symbol of strength and resilience.

meanings.definition: The act of composing or putting together.
meanings.sent1: The composer's composednesses in creating the symphony was evident in every note.
meanings.sent2: The composednesses of the puzzle pieces made it easier to solve.
meanings.sent3: The composednesses of the chef in the kitchen was like watching a master artist at work.
meanings.sent4: The composednesses of the writer in weaving together the plot was like watching a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent5: The composednesses of the architect in designing the building was truly impressive.
